attributes.action: bbc bias in favour of ukip
attributes.additional_details: To ask the Minister to instigate an enquiry into the blatant bias in favour of the UK Independence Party  by the BBC during the run-up to the May 2014 local and European Parliamentary elections. The BBC has not shown impartiality and has given fawning coverage to UKIP out of proportion with their actual representation.

rejection.details: For the BBC and the BBC Trust to answer.
